lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I can!

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Give them a fish and they eat only tonight- Give them a fishing pole and they eat every night.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a supervisor in a grocery store.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart feel good.
lender.occupational_info:
I take care of my husband and my house. I'm a very good cook, I love to read and I take lots of photos. I do tai chi for exercise and love to sing.
God is very important to me and my family and we are very blessed that He loves us and cares for us.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in online media.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: It's a good feeling as we go about our day to know that a world away someone is making a better life because people care. Pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: In "developed" nations people make a mess and pay others to clean up behind them :-)

lender.name: gary
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to succeed
lender.occupational_info: We build communication equipment.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: life is all about taking risks. Many people have taken risks on me so that I could have the oppurtunity to advance in my life. I'm glad to be able to pass that along.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: We want people to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: sales

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: i think if everyone that was blessed by the Lord helped all those that weren,t as fortunate then all world hunger and other things would be cured. I am just trying to keep up my part
lender.occupational_info: I don,t work i,m a freshman in highschool that attends southwest church of christ in kentucky

lender.name: Vikas
lender.loan_because: i want to make difference in life of someone who aspires to change for better...

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed with my life. I think it is only right that I try to give back. I like the idea of helping people that also help themselves to reach their dreams.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.occupational_info: I am a bilingual teacher at a school that has primarily economically-disadvantaged children.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I believe Micro Credit Loans can really change lives.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: After a period of struggle, my husband and I both just got better paying jobs, our financial needs are being met, and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have been doing assembly work, but will now be keeping track of parts and supplies.

lender.name: The Brays of PDX
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can, and because we must, and because you can change the world in small ways.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: To make an impact on global economic development at the grass roots level.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to work toward their goals.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: I want to try to help other women improve their lives and the lives of their children and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I have gone back to school at age 45 to try to increase our livelihood and to model the value of education to my two beautiful daughters.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: i admire entrepreneurial will and passion
lender.occupational_info: i am involved with a number of start-up and emerging businesses

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to prove themselves.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people achieve their dreams of a better future for themselves and/or families.

lender.name: SUE
lender.loan_because: We all deserve a chance in life.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Lending is a way to help people preserve their dignity and make their lives better. Hand-outs help, but loans build self-sufficienty - what better payback could there be!
lender.occupational_info: I help people work better.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: This site reminded me of my grandpa. He ran a store, then bought property and slowly worked his way up the money ladder while his wife raised 5 kids.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: it's what God calls us to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies put procedures and practices in place that help them stay in business longer

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I like to support the entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Working to find a cure for cancer.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. As a nurse, wife, and mother it feels right to continue to care for people farther than my arms can reach. We all have dreams, I am so thankful that I am able to help someone else's come true.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate people in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school library. Every day, young students come with their classes and with their parents to read and check out books. Students at my school love books, and love stories. All of us have stories!

lender.name: REGINA M.
lender.loan_because: I care about others who struggle to make a decent living.

lender.name: Luanne
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and document computer desktop standard installations at a community college in New Mexico.

lender.name: A. Traveling Bear
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to live their dreams.

lender.name: Rosanna M.
lender.loan_because: when I help others realize their potential, I am realizing my own potential to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: As a leadership coach and organizational consultant, I help individuals and teams make a difference with their talents. I believe the human spirit is a cauldron of possibility and we each play a part in helping the possibility become a reality.

lender.name: Niesha
lender.loan_because: What a great way to make a difference !

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: Finally, there's a way to reach out person-to-person, give tangible hope and support, and together create a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I used to write advertising. Now I write poetry, sing with Viva la Musica!, and make art in churches.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I am a businessman myself and know how hard it is to raise the money. I want to help someone who is going through the process of funding a business.
lender.occupational_info: My work is my life. I am trotting the glob in the search of the best. My interests are human sexuality and history.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: If everyone does a little.. ..it adds up to a lot! The loan is a hand up not a hand out.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the capacity of micro-loans to make a significant difference in people's lives.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: a small amount can change someone's life!

lender.name: Carren
lender.loan_because: I love to help others as much as I can. I wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: I help educate physicians about my medications and disease states to improve patients lives.

lender.name: Buffalo Bill Johnston
lender.loan_because: The world of food, shelter, and entertainment deserves everyone's small push. "Pay it forward!" Thanks to wikipedia, thanks to google, and thanks to kiva, the world is growing into a smarter better place.
lender.occupational_info: Owner, Johnston's Furnished Rooms and Studio Apartments, month-to-month rentals in Buffalo, NY USA, Phone us tonight and check in with Paypal. Johnston's Coin Operated Games, vendor of arcade games played in local businesses. Visit Niagara Falls NY, just 21 miles north of Buffalo NY, 20 million annual visitors! Visit the Buffalo Zoo, 400,000 annual visitors! Buffalo airport code BUF.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves and their communities.

lender.name: chris & holly
lender.loan_because: Just simply because we like helping people. I've been to some of the poorest places in the world and it has completely changed my outlook and made me realize how fortunate I am to live where I do and live the kind of life I live so I donate to give other people that chance too.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrative assistant for the military. My husband is a cable guy.

lender.name: Kathie
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I distribute medical devices which help people with circulation and pain control. I help with their health & wealth by a network marketting system. It's gratifying work.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are taking the initiative to help themselves by starting their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in school, studying to become an attorney.

lender.name: digitalword
lender.loan_because: Digital Word believes in the karma of good business. An entrepreneur herself, Digital Word's president believes microlending fosters the growth of the same global economy to which she owes her company's success.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies write web content and market their websites.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I have retired from business.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am now a jewelry designer and maker.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone hope with a hand up, and dignity, from them knowing that it is not a hand out. It is also really neat to track the progress of the businesses as they reach their goals!

lender.name: reni
lender.loan_because: I loan because it can help someone and make a difference in their life. There are a lot of hard working people out there who just need a little help to make their dreams come true. "Pay it Forward"
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries/surgeries to restore their health/physical function.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I just want to show my kids that each of us can always do something nice for somebody somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as CFO of my small business in Silicon Valley. Also owns my consulting business.

lender.name: Connie T.
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a place where I can help people who are trying to help themselves. I admire the way they have planned a project that will give them indpendence and, in many cases, benefit their community as well. I applaud their dignity and feel honored to assist them.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from a 30-year teaching career five years ago. My husband had just passed away and I was determined to keep our farm operational as best I could. I've kept a small herd of our cows and rented out the cropland. It's been a real learning experience - not always easy but very rewarding!

lender.name: Simba
lender.loan_because: Helping Other People Everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I help self employed people in North America.

lender.name: Peter and Shelley
lender.loan_because: We have had so many blessings thoughout our lives, we feel that without the help of others we wouldn't have been so successful.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It is only right to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Stressful but interesting.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Free market capitalism is the best path to prosperity.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care!

lender.name: roisin
lender.loan_because: i feel we as a family are very fortunate and blessed and as a result would like to help others

lender.name: Amy & Zack
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I want to have a long supply of graiuns, beans, and spices for a bout a year and I would like to rent this small space to start a small vegetarian restaurant and also would want to buy a small stiove and some kitchen utensils, the profits will also go on helping poor people especially poor street children. I would want to have a regular feeding program on depressed areas every weekends. But I only have limited financial capacity so Im humbly asking anybody out there to lend any amount from their benevolent heart. I would greatly appreciate a donation of $1000 but any amount would do. Thank you very much.
lender.occupational_info: Im a nurse but being a nurse here in the Philippines doesn't pay well compared to other countriues. I almost earn like minimun wage about $150 dollars a month. But I have a passion for distributing food to the hungry so I find ways to keep my vegetarian feeding program to still continue

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide economic opportunity for hard-working people around the world.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone should have a chance to make a difference in this world. Provide the best they can for family, and have the will to do there very best!

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can and I like helping people. These people are an inspiration.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the production of various publications, being the link between the clients and the production crew. I am also the editor and associate publisher of Bicycle Paper a cycling publication.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Giving to those who are working toward a goal of self-sufficiency is a good thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I search for your ancestors.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I am the loving parent of four children, one of whom is gay. I know that not all parents can protect their children no matter how much they love them. This is one way to help a few parents to, at the very least, give their children financial stability.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public school. one on one with students and their parents who homeschool them, consulting and teaching them how to homeschool.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to make a big difference.

lender.name: Beegee
lender.loan_because: I like giving back to the world. So much has been given to me over the years, when I didn't have enough for my family. Now I can afford to give a little back, because I do have enough for my family!
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes to people looking for a new place to live.

lender.name: Lisa B.
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place. Little things CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find their ancestors and tell their stories, so that their legacy will continue for future generations.

lender.name: Family of Ashwitha
lender.loan_because:
We find this to be a splendidly meaningful, uplifting and responsible way to share your blessings with those for whom they will be much more valuable.
Where is a NOBEL peace prize when you really need one, uhhhh ?
KIVA wins it hands down !!!! .
lender.occupational_info: While we, the proud parents of Ashwitha (Achu) are both "Soft"ware Engineers at work, try hard as we may, manage barely to keep up with a "Soft" one at home :-)

lender.name: dave/kim
lender.loan_because: i believe we should fight the war on poverty.
lender.occupational_info: physical education and social studies teacher.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can do something right now to help someone in need across the globe.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I am an alum of Santa Clara University, a Jesuit university located in the Silicon Valley, California. Motivated by our core values - competence, conscience, and compassion - I hope to do my part in making a difference, however big or small it may be.

lender.name: Rylona Watson
lender.occupation: Independant Consultant for Ambit Energy, Inc.
lender.loan_because: My contributions make a difference by helping to pull families up and out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: My work is educating consumers about Energy Deregulation and the extraordinary opportunities afforded by this one time transfer of wealth.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I like to support needed businesses and I think this is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying audio engineering

lender.name: Maurice-Pierre
lender.loan_because: HI! ~ I believe that we can make a GOOD difference locally but also can reach OUT further AWAY too and make an EVEN Greater DIFFERENCE in the life of Others who are less fortunate in life and NEED our Special Help and Support ! Ciao :)
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteering but still do some teaching as I am specialized in French; enjoying children's curiosity n eagerness to learn more... Do a variety of volunteering exp. now as it's my time in life to give back; LIFE has been good to me; I am so very thankful and want to Share and DO more... KIVA seems like a real perfect opportunity!

lender.name: charisma
lender.loan_because: i want to start a onion bussiness here in my place.
lender.occupational_info: im working as a reviser before and now i have a small bussines like transparrent glass for shake.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am completing a masters degree at California State University so I can teach American, Mexican and Chinese history.

lender.name: Geoff & Cheryl
lender.loan_because: We like to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: We enjoy travelling and seeing the world.

lender.name: ROBERT
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunte enough to be in a positon where I can help others, also, because I've been in the same position and needed help many times before.

lender.name: Kremp Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others reach their goals and dreams.

lender.name: samir
lender.loan_because: For a good this cause this is least i can do.I higly encourage whoever can to do.May be this is one thing which will unite all human beings for the right cause peace on earth.

lender.name: Arun | MeerMedia
lender.loan_because:
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
- Winston Churchill

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I think those of us who have been blessed with much should be willing to help others who have not.

lender.name: Meena
lender.loan_because: I love making a better change in someone else's life
lender.occupational_info: Working in a bank

lender.name: Werner
lender.loan_because: It's the easiest and most efficient way to help people to raise and develop their own business.

lender.name: Maaike
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to a better world, where there is not such a huge difference between rich en poor. I happen to be born in wealthy country. I want to help people, with my means and knowing where and who I help.
lender.occupational_info: I advise (local) government to create a sustainable watersystem in city areas. Sustainable in this case is: not causing any problems in other places, time, etc. How do you manage groundwater, rain, surface water, etc.?

lender.name: Debbi
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone else's life and that feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy photography

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: it creates a more personal connection than just donating to a large organization. It's an opportunity to feel grateful for what I have, and to help other people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a massage therapist and energy medicine practitioner. I help people relax, become more balanced, and help to reduce pain.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance to succeed in life
lender.occupational_info: I am a hard worker and am inventive. I like my work and enjoy it to the fullest. I got my tour bus drivers license and as of 2012 I am working as a technical service employeeat Van Dijk Education who provides all schoolbooks throughout the Benelux

lender.name: claudie
lender.loan_because: I find Kiva a very useful tool , for helping people in need all around the world.What I find the most interesting is lending money instead of giving money. That's also a good idea to get news from the journals!.It's a so great pleasure reading them!

lender.name: Patricia & David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are in the rock business. We sell stone made into material used in building.

lender.name: Terrence
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to circulate the planet's resources.
lender.occupational_info: School Teacher (retired)

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Great way to help others
lender.occupational_info: Computer Software Development

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I want to help people acheive their dreams.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I have had the benefit of loans that allowed me to get an education and pursue a career in science. I think everyone should have that kind of opportunity and I hope I can pass along a little bit of help to someone else.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I design e-Learning courses on a contract basis.

lender.name: Pepino Suave
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Fun.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: This program is a great way to give people the opportunities that have been given to me. It doesn't take much to make a significant difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops new medications for people who are sick.

lender.name: Monica & Cody
lender.loan_because: When I really needed money, a good friend lent it to me, now it's time to complete the circle.

lender.name: Cascade DuSel
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and the impact it can have on local and global economies.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to American school children ages 11-14

lender.name: yanira & Sebastian
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a little help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a giving person by nature and I believe that is what makes the world a better place.

lender.name: I.D.G.F. Group
lender.loan_because: We beleive and trust.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams just as those have once helped me to achieve mine. Lets keep "Paying it Forward."
lender.occupational_info: We help women experiencing hair loss by providing them with natural and undetectable hair replacement systems.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Because I can......simple as that. I have been blessed with a wonderful life and an intensely fulfilling career for which I went to school for 2 years, tuition free. I love what I do...I'm one of those rare people who happen to get a paycheck for what I do everyday. I make good money and am very happy to pass it on to people who are less fortunate than I am, who can use the money to make better lives for themselves and their families and will appreciate it.
lender.occupational_info: I do CAT scans at an imaging center in Florida.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are struggling but attempting to help themselves... sometimes people just need a little extra help...what a great opportunity this is....
lender.occupational_info: I am in the process of discovering what it is I want to do with my life... I recently gave up my job sold my house and moved across the country to begin anew....

lender.name: Kerstin Kramer
lender.occupational_info: Translation Agency - translating documents from one language into another.

lender.name: donna/gizmo
lender.loan_because: it feels good ! everyone deserves a chance to support their familes - i'm glad to be able to help their dream!

lender.name: Cake Bank
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help less fortunate people move forward in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who meet up to eat cake and micro lend.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I understand wanting to become successful. If you have the will and the drive to succeed you can make all of your dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a first grade teacher in an impovershed Chicago neighborhood.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: helping people around the world makes me feel good, and trying to improve a persons life can benefit more than that person. I want to do whatever I can to help people around the world. And every time I make a donation, it encourages me to make another.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to support enterprising people in parts of the world where I work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wildlife photographer that specializes in endangered species and conservation worldwide

lender.name: Wilson World Issues
lender.loan_because: the students of Mrs. Kaspar's World Issues class would like to make a contribution to developing regions worldwide. We are happy to help those that would like a chance to build a business and be successful.

lender.name: The Swallens
lender.loan_because: It's important to help where help is needed.

lender.name: BSH
lender.loan_because: To show free markets work

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am also a small business owner. I want to make a difference where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make sure children's needs are met and I talk with children and families to help resolve conflicts and problems at home.

lender.name: Sallee
lender.loan_because: It is such a wonderful idea for people like me who have always loved giving of myself to others. In the past I have sponsored children. I like this idea even better. I would rather teach a man to fish, than just give him/her a fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired nurse. I now do computer work, building websites. I also work with dogs. I have trained my dog to work with disabled children.

lender.name: JOHN&DIANE
lender.loan_because: IT'S THE RIGHT THING TO DO, AND IT FEELS GOOD!!!! WHO SAID YOU CANT MAKE A DIFFERENCE.

lender.name: Lettie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become independent. This improves self-esteem and the individual will be able to transfer this empowerment to others.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to international communities that I spent several years living and working in.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English, particularly how to spell. I also teach my children about the world and their place in it, and how they too can make a difference.

lender.name: ADELAIDE
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a hand once in a lifetime
lender.occupational_info: I ENJOY MY JOB, IT IS SACRED TO ME COOKING FOR THE PUBLIC,I DO IT WITH LOVE,RESPECT .I COOK LIKE IF I AM COOKING FOR MY FAMILY, NAMASTE

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and have more than enough...therefore I try to give a helping hand to someone with hope in their heart.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I've always been searching for ways to make a difference in other people's lives. I think helping people is one of our higher purposes.
lender.occupational_info: business student

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because:
I realize how lucky I am. There are lots of people who need to get a chance in creating a better live. I hope that whit a little help from me, someone somewhere can make their dream a reality.
Doesn‚Äôt everyone deserve a chance!

lender.name: Ivan&Dusty
lender.loan_because: We loan because it seems like the MOST simplistic way to help change a life. We are afforded many opportunities in our own family simply because of where we were born:) God's blessings and good health to all of you!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I work as nurses. We also run our own Adult Foster Care Home. We care for Mentally Impaired, Physically Handicapped Adults. We are the proud parents of 4 children. This is our first loan and look forward to being able to give many more!

lender.name: Rein Pulz
lender.loan_because: it helps others.
lender.occupational_info: Health care.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.occupational_info: I produce short and feature length narrative films that are socially responsible and entertaining.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: it gives me an opportunity to help support other people which in turn will have a positive effect on their community.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I had the chance to start my own business and I want other people to give that same chance, so they can support themselves and their families. And this is such a great way to make this possible all over the world.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I work hard to travel and have the nice things in life. I want to help other people around the world experience success and there dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Service Manager at a BMW dealership in California, USA.

lender.name: Natascha
lender.occupational_info: I do not work professionally so that I can be available to my young son 100% of his day. He has a learning disablility and it is my job to make sure that he learns academics, ethics, street-smarts, and compassion in order for him to develop into a man who is self-sufficient, independent, and can take care of his family long after I am no longer on this earth.

lender.name: Heather & Rob
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an incredible way to connect and make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Rob has a General Contracting/Construction business in Manhattan, NY USA. Heather is a Buyer for a retailer in NY. She buy the goods that the retailer sells.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It gives me a chance to support, in a small but significant way, individuals or families trying to improve their lives, particularly when other sources may be absent or difficult.
lender.occupational_info: Newly retired, I can now set my own pace and choose the agenda. Besides keeping healthy and productive, I tend to concentrate on my own family, though I do reach out to others, as well. I have an ample supply of positive things to do.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to follow the example of Christ (Love all people from all nations), improve relationship between people of the world, and to provide hope for those who have a will to successed.

lender.name: Peter Grevstad
lender.loan_because: I worked in developing countries -Thailand, China and Viet Nam - for approximately ten years. I saw large initiatives that failed, and I believe in grassroots activism and giving/lending.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher. I teach in a college in Toronto, Canada. For nearly 15 years I worked in developing and developed countries. The Czech Republic, Thailand, China, Viet Nam, and in Japan.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: "what do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?"
lender.occupational_info: I am a painter, living and working in New York city.

lender.name: Mike & Donna
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Mike manages a computer network for a school. Donna works in a hospital financial office.

lender.name: Jason & Tracy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of Micro-economics to change the world.

lender.name: Kristina & Ila
lender.loan_because: There are hard working people in the world who want to make a living and provide for their families. Corporations don't care -- we do...
lender.occupational_info: I provide health care for everyone in the family. I value the family unit as a conduit to health and happiness.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: This LOAN was a Christmas gift for my Sister Karole.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and do volunteer work.

lender.name: Spiro
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to do so and contribution is very important in my life. The more you give, the more you get!
lender.occupational_info: I work as support staff in an organization that helps people live the best possible life they can.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have worked extensively in international development and deeply understand the amazing possibilities that micro lending can create.
lender.occupational_info: My job is business development and investment attraction for the digital media sector.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others as I start out myself
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance computer graphics creator. I make 2d and 3d images used in graphic design work, games, and animations. I'm just starting out my business and building my stock. I hope to help others grow their businesses as I learn to grow my own.

lender.name: √âmilie
lender.loan_because: It's a cheap and easy way to make tremendous difference in someone's life. There really is no reason not to do it!
lender.occupational_info: My work consists in helping businesses present themselves in a beautiful and consistent way.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to do so. I feel obligated to help others who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of working with kids who have difficulties learning in a regular classroom.

lender.name: The Storey Family
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to give back. We want to help others motivated to help themselves.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am loaning in my daughter Brynn's memory. My daughter, my only child Brynn died in January 2007 at just 12 years old. I am helping to share Brynn's generous spirit. Remembering Brynn forever, and ever. I also have an online shop in order to raise funds for an arts school bursary in Brynn's name. It is http://www.brynnalex.etsy.com

lender.name: angie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help out other women in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make the software as good as possible

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work with students who have developmental disabilities to help them reach their full potential.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of women through education and entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit, transition, coach and consult professionals throughout their career with my company.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupational_info: I make websites. I figure out what information and buttons and links go on each page, and what happens when you click on a link or button. I also decide what the pages look like.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in my own small way.
lender.occupational_info: I advise museums and other non-profit organizations how to increase their base of members and donors.

lender.name: Collars With Color
lender.loan_because: People need bootstraps.
lender.occupational_info: I make handmade hemp and organic cotton dog/cat collars

lender.name: JoAnne
lender.loan_because: I`m trying to be a better person and make a difference with random acts of kindness

lender.name: Mary & Terry
lender.loan_because: there ought to be enough to go around

lender.name: Kristen and Josh
lender.loan_because: It is in investment in helping people to sustain and improve the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Reed
lender.loan_because: We need to make the world a better place, if people have an opportunity, they can acheive anything.
lender.occupational_info: Married with three kids. Social Worker working with families, kids and adults.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: Restaurant Owner

lender.name: Alice and Alan
lender.loan_because: I believe that even small gestures can make a big difference. We are both small business owners ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their problems and my husband helps keep trees healthy and cuts them down when they are dangerous.

lender.name: Sam & Telko
lender.loan_because: It's a way of showing compassion for others who are in need and just helping out where you can.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people in their business and enable them to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping special people to find a job, I am helping companies to find special people.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: As Mollie Ivans once said; "Everybody does better when everybody does better."
lender.occupational_info: I try to be original and creative even in working around the house.

lender.name: James & Clare
lender.loan_because: We believe in Kiva, helping people who are working to improve the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: James edits movies for theaters and Clare is a writer & cares for our 3 children.

lender.name: Beth and Randy
lender.loan_because: this is an excellent opportunity to help someone else better their lives.

lender.name: Women of Color Kiva Giving Group
Carson
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: hard work and commitment to improve should be rewarded regardless of where one happened to be born.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university and help those in public education and libraries to develop their capacity to lead, to collaborate with others and to advocate for their value to their communities.

lender.name: Brodie
lender.loan_because: Theres no other joy like helping others grow.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: These loans can make a huge difference. It feels really good to help.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It is a secure way to financially impact the lives of people who are helping themselves to the best of their abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I help college students in the US get lucrative jobs with the aim of creating a cycle of giving back.

lender.name: Jack & Pamela
lender.occupation: Pam: registered nurse, Jack: UW administr.
lender.loan_because: We have seen how a little money in the hands of a good, honest person can change their lives and the lives of their children.
lender.occupational_info: Pam helps pregnant women with serious health risks. Jack provides legal advice to a small city.

lender.name: Pamela Singer
lender.loan_because: I teach at an International Baccalaureate School. We emphasize action plans to give back to the world community.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year old students.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's fun, it's helpful, and it is absolutely the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I work in Silicon Valley representing companies who manufacture components who want to sell their products to companies in Silicon Valley.

lender.name: The Martin Family
lender.loan_because: If you teach a man to fish....

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: these hard working small entrepreneurs and their families deserve the support of those of us who live in easier conditions.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to make a difference. I am giving these loans in the names of my various family members instead of Christmas presents. They will be happier!
lender.occupational_info: We work with companies and people to help them improve.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.occupation: I'm a f/t mom, that works p/t at a video store.
lender.loan_because: The question is, "Why not?" Too many people take for granted what they have in life. My family and I are very blessed to have as much as we do. Reading these entrepreneur's stories, is a great reminder on how you can make a difference in someone's life. Just a small loan could turn a life around, in a very big way. Also, what better way is there, to teach my daughter about the gift of giving, and kindness? To laugh often and much; to win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children; to earn the appreciation of honest critics and to endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty; to find the best in others; to leave the world a bit better whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded. Ralph Waldo Emerson
lender.occupational_info:
Everyone needs help at some point in their life, and I am extremely pleased to be able to be a part of this.
This site is one of the best things I have learned about in years! To think just a small loan can help someone better their health, home, and family, is very rewarding.
Thank you so much for making it possible for everyday people like me, to help out!

lender.name: ohillary
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Chandler and Claire
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves!

lender.name: DENNIS
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others!

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of this type of giving. I joined the Peace Corps in the 60's and continue this path because I have seen it make a difference for everyone involved.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate. When I had to go out on my own at 50, I had a good education and a good job. I was able to build a good life in many ways. To be able lend a hand to another human being struggling to build a life, is a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I am 78 years old so I don't have to go to work every day. I still love to help people learn something new.

lender.name: Alwina
lender.loan_because: If not me, who?
lender.occupational_info: I work with graduate students at a university, helping them get the support and services they need to be successful.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to those who helped me when I was in need. All the best to you!

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: of Mother Teresa When a poor person dies of hunger, it has not happened because God did not take care of him or her. It has happened because neither you nor I wanted to give that person what he or she needed.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: "What do we live for if not to make the world less difficult for each other" George Eliot
lender.occupational_info: We grow fresh sweet cherries which are exported all over the world.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: Because i am blessed with financial security and i would like to help people make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of ill adults and children in their home

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I received support from many people along the way and want to carry on the tradition. We can and do make a difference. Living in Canada means we have access to capital everywhere and everyone deserves this possibility.
lender.occupational_info: We design and facilitate learning experiences where the participants actively engage and learn together. About themselves, each other, their organization, and the world. Learning does change the world.

lender.name: Pierre Mourier
lender.loan_because: I believe in market-driven solutions.

lender.name: Todd & Tov
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Tina- Maryland
lender.loan_because: all those who want to work and can work..should be given the opportunity to work.

lender.name: Blackwell
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I write.

lender.name: Leslye
lender.loan_because: my family and I enjoy the joy that comes from helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping at-risk kids leave to love reading.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I hope that my loans will improve the lives of others and that there would be people to help me if I was in need. My mother grew up with 8 brothers and sisters and lived in poverty while growing up. Hearing her stories from childhood makes me want to help others who are in the same circumstance.
lender.occupational_info:
During various periods in my life, I have been without a job, even with a bachelor's degree so I know how hard it can be trying to make it in this world. But I continue to strive to make my life better. Sometimes I think my life is not so great but then when I look at other people in the world, I realize how fortunate I am and I believe in sharing my wealth, albeit small, that I do have.
Currently, I make bracelets and draw sketches (mostly oriental sketches).

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupation: Mother and Part-Owner of HVAC Company

lender.name: Aundra
lender.loan_because: I feel like it is the right thing to do. I hope that one day I will be able to donate more.

lender.name: Maji
lender.loan_because: it is an innovative and fresh way to help those in need
lender.occupational_info: I go to school in hopes of one day becoming a surgeon.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: with less money than my family would spend on dinner at a restaurant, I can empower someone who wants to make a big change in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that my 2 boys are fed, well rested, educated and loved.

lender.name: Jamie & Mark
lender.loan_because: We have so much and it was time to play it forward
lender.occupational_info: We are just people who care about others in the world

lender.name: Bjorn
lender.loan_because: I want to give back into communitites which I will travel through on my overland trip from the UK to Australia

lender.name: Raz
lender.loan_because: I want to and I can

lender.name: Jewelry Locker
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling of knowing that someone in the world can live their dream, provide better for their family, and contribute to the quality of their community with what help I can afford through Christ who blesses me 'every day'. Giving at home and abroad is but one of my obligations to repay the debt that Christ paid for me. This is God's world! I am but a servant of the Lord.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: To help someone improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Social Worker who works with people who have a terminal disease. I try to help the patient and their family prepare for death when medicine cannot cure them and they may have less than 6 months to live. I work with a team of doctors, nurses, home health aides, chaplains and volunteers to help bring physical, social, emotional and spiritual comfort and dignity as they approach the end of their life.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: The loans allow me to participate in a new system for generating financial well being- person to person or small group. Thank you for the opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of young children who believes in the power of compassion and self motivation.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: what you give out comes back multiplied !

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I want to "Be the Change You Want to See in the World" . I know that I have been born into a life of relative ease and abundance simply by virtue of being born in the US. I recognize there are those who were not as fortunate to win the geographic lottery and small actions on their behalf can make big differences..
lender.occupational_info: I am a CFP. I help people identify their life goals and make strategies toward fulfilling them.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I like to support entrepreneurship globally.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I want others to know there are still good people left in this world!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Oklahoma City Communitiy College.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: Briana
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to end world hunger.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: We want individuals to financially and emotionally succeed by lending our good fortune to them. (Dad missing from photo)
lender.occupational_info: We are a family embracing peace, health, happiness, education, and capitalism. (Dad missing from photo)

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.loan_because: small steps can make a difference

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can. I feel that it's my obligation to help out those in need.

lender.name: nalinika
lender.loan_because: I can, should and want to..

lender.name: KATHERINE
lender.loan_because: I want to support and empower women in other parts of the world to improve their lives and the lives of their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am age 64 .. I have worked very hard since I was 14 years old .. mostly selling a product. By working very hard and saving I was able to raise two children to a high standard of living and blessed enough to retire modestly at age 56.

lender.name: Joseph & Melissa
lender.loan_because: My wife & I would like to offer financial assistance to aspiring entrepreneurs with the hope that they might be able to help others in the future.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: "One Planet, One People, Please."

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to make your own business a success and I want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a shop that makes metal railings and I also just started an internet site with information about venues in the U.S.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: It gives me a chance to give others an opporunity to improve their lives so they in turn can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage construction projects for Walt Disney World.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: A little help goes a long way in some parts of the world. Kiva is a direct path to invest in the dreams of hardworking people.

lender.name: Lisako
lender.loan_because: I have traveled around the world, and seen the difference in what they have, to what I have.

lender.name: Consensus Foundation
lender.loan_because: We believe in teaching to fish, I only donate to groups or people that fulfill that premise. We love what KIVA is doing and will continue to support this vision.
lender.occupational_info: Personal Growth, personal awareness of my feelings and results.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: such a small gesture from me can make such a big impact on someone so far away.
lender.occupational_info: I do medical research in the United States.

lender.name: patut
lender.loan_because: I need loan to open school for children that live in street to find money just for eat.
lender.occupational_info: I like to teach poor children but i don't have enough money to do that, so i need to borrow US$200.000 just in one week then i will return it.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I think we are all here to help each other. This was such a great way to be able to help even with just a little.
lender.occupational_info: I have a marketing company that helps business's stay in touch with their clients.

lender.name: Mrs DuSel
lender.loan_because: Our class is studying Spanish and the Spanish Speaking world and we want to help make someones dreams come true.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: I've been helped by so many in my life and am grateful & blessed for the abundance within my life. KIVA is helping me 'pay it forward.'

lender.name: The Eddie Family
lender.occupational_info: Magazine and web publishing.

lender.name: Ida
lender.loan_because: A little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver babies in one of the busiest hospitals in Washington, D.C.

lender.name: Craig W. Beebe
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to do so, and believe that we all share a responsibility to lift up those around us.
lender.occupational_info: I manage student residence halls at a University in New Orleans, Louisiana, USA.

lender.name: Jimmy Two Shoes
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find places to live and call home. I help people buy and sell their homes.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help my sisters and brothers in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase services for the government.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone else who is working their own business as I know how hard it is myself to succeed.
